name: NEW YORK YACHT CLUB 57

images.alt: New York YC 57 photo on sailboatdata.com

notes:
aka 57 FOOT CLASS.
Not actually called NEW YORK 57 when the three were first launched. (Original owners were NYYC members and newspaper articles described them as such.) The '57' is her original rating under the Universal Rule. They raced against each other as class for at least one season and were later altered for handicap racing.
Original names: 'Istalena', 'Aurora', and 'Winsome'. 
It is thought that the last surviving boat, Istalena, (shown here) was lost in the 1960's.
